channel.title: Fashion Television Daily Podcast
channel.description: Get the weekly scoop on what is new and interesting in the world of fashion.

item.title: Ungaro Spring 2010
item.description: Celebrity Madness Hits French Fashion - Behind the scenes at Lindsay Lohan's controversial debut for Ungaro.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Vivienne Westwood Fall 2009
item.description: Vivienne Westwood, the candid queen of British fashion, shows her fall 2009 cllection in London.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Betsey Johnson talks retirement
item.description: Jeanne gets an exclusive one-on-one interview with the 67-year-old designer.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Burberry's NEW Collection
item.description: Designer Christopher Bailey presents Burberry Spring/Summer 2010 at home in London.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: The latest from L.A.M.B.
item.description: The latest fashions from pop star and style icon, Gwen Stefani.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: D&G Launch New Fragrance
item.description: Naomi Campbell, Claudia Schiffer and Eva Herzigova represent the designer's first perfume anthology.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Spotlight: Sienna Miller
item.description: Jeanne catches up with actress and designer Sienna Miller in Berlin.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Model Profile: Raquel Zimmermann
item.description: From Victoria Secret to the runways of Brazil - Catching up with Raquel Zimmermann.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Gisele Bundchen the Last Supermodel
item.description: The world's highest paid model, causes a frenzy in Brazil, when she returns home.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Coco Rocha and Behati Prinsloo
item.description: On set with supermodels - and good friends - Coco Rocha and Behati Prinsloo as they star in Holt Renfrew's first ever video (which is inspired by the pair's YouTube videos).
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Daria Werbowy FLARE Cover Shoot
item.description: On set in New York with Canadian supermodel Daria Werbowy as she shoots three different covers - and some more risque topless shots - for FLARE Magazine's 30th anniversary issue.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Jean Paul Gaultier Fall Couture 2009
item.description: In Paris, Jean Paul Gaultier goes Old Hollywood in his latest couture collection. Interviews with Mickey Rourke and Kylie Minogue.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Fashion Families
item.description: Family tradition is something that is truly honoured in Italy and family ties can give companies an edge. Of the many fashion families in Italy, we narrowed it down to four iconic labels with generations of family members involved.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Marc by Marc Jacobs Fall 2009
item.description: Marc Jacobs is likely the most influential designer in American fashion but as popular as his eponymous label is, his younger line, Marc by Marc Jacobs is just as hot. In this episode, Jacobs reveals his secret to staying young.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: CFDAS 2009
item.description: FT goes behind-the-scenes: Claire Danes, Blake Lively, Kirsten Dunst and other A-list celebrities attend New York's 27th annual Council of Fashion Designers of America Awards - the "Oscars of the fashion world."
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Mike Ruiz
item.description: Mike Ruiz is well known for his surreal and fantasy-driven celebrity and fashion photography. Mike Ruiz recently joined Jeanne Beker as one of the judges on Canada's Next Top Model and opens up about his life both behind and in front of the lens.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Extreme Shoulders
item.description: A fashion trend from the 80s comes back into power.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Extreme Shoulders
item.description: A fashion trend from the 80s comes back into power.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Valentino does Hollywood
item.description: Since the legendary designer recently received a star on the Rodeo Drive Walk of Style and has been busy promoting the recently released documentary he stars in, we wondered if conquering tinseltown was 'the Last Emperor's' next big goal.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Jason Wu Fall 2009
item.description: From Rags to Riches - How Jason Wu went from playing with dolls to dressing the First Lady.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: The Blonds Spring 2009
item.description: In New York, we take a revealing look at why 'the blonds' have more fun.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Chado Ralph Rucci Spring 2009
item.description: Jeanne has a date with style- as she takes her boyfriend backstage and in the front row to his very first fashion show - Ralph Rucci Spring 2009.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Victoria's Secret 2008
item.description: In Miami, behind the scenes at the world's sexiest fashion show in the new fashionable Fontainebleau.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Jean Paul Gaultier Haute Couture Fall 2008
item.description: For his 2008 Fall-Winter couture collection, Jean Paul Gaultier went back into his archives and reinvented the cage. As he points out, 'It's like I make plastic surgery on my old corset!'
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Viktor & Rolf
item.description: Viktor Horsting and Rolf Snoeren made a 'glamorous protest' for fall and for spring, took fashion out of this world with the help of supermodel Shalom Harlow and her clones.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Toronto Fashion Week Highlights
item.description: Highlights from the spring collections and our own mini studio at Toronto Fashion Week.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Christian Lacroix Haute Couture Fall 2008
item.description: Helen Mirren and Patricia Arquette are blown away by Lacroix who chose to present a strong and slightly aggressive collection 'in a period when everything is so difficult.'
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Pearl and Daisy Lowe
item.description: Designer Pearl Lowe - the mother of Britain's 'It Girl' reveals how she overcame addiction and found herself in fashion.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Maybelline & Ford Models
item.description: Maybelline Cosmetics and Ford Models partner for a model search to find the new face for Maybelline cosmetics.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Life Ball 2008
item.description: The Life Ball-Europe's largest and most extravagant HIV and AIDS charity event-was sexier than ever this year with high-end lingerie label, Agent Provocateur. Go to iTunes to download the full episode!
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Anna Sui Spring 2008
item.description: Anna Sui presents her spring 2008 collection during New York Fashion Week. Go to iTunes to download the full episode!
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Calvin Klein Fall 2008
item.description: Francisco Costa, the CFDA's womenswear designer of the year, presents his award winning fall collection for Calvin Klein. Go to iTunes to download the full episode!
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Best of Couture
item.description: From stars to mermaids to farewells, the best of spring haute couture in Paris. Go to iTunes to download the full episode!
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: CFDA 2008 Highlights
item.description: The New York Public Library hosts the 26th annual Council of Fashion Designers of America Awards, where the fashion industry and loads of celebs came out to recognize outstanding contributions made to American fashion.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Yves Saint Laurent
item.description: Yves Saint Laurent, one of the greatest fashion designers of all time, passed away on June 1st, 2008. This is our look back at the life and career of the designer who revolutionized the face of fashion. Go to iTunes to download the full episode!
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: J.D. Ferguson
item.description: A day in the life of busy photographer JD Ferguson as he shoots top models and talks about Karl Lagerfeld and porn stars. Go to iTunes to download the full episode!
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Alexander McQueen
item.description: Godfrey Deeny calls this collection 'the show to see before you die'. We also score a rare interview with the shy designer at his store opening in L.A. Go to iTunes to download the full episode!
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: MET Superheroes Exhibit
item.description: Hosted by Giorgio Armani, George Clooney, Julia Roberts and Anna Wintour, stars from Tom Cruise to J Lo came out to take a first look at this year's exhibit 'Superheroes: Fashion and Fantasy.' Go to iTunes to download the full episode!
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Ports 1961
item.description: From Africa in spring to Scotland in fall, Canadian designer Tia Cibani takes the Ports woman around the world. Go to iTunes to download the full episode!
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Tanya Dziahileva
item.description: Just 16 years old, the Belarusian model has already been working for over three years now, and has walked for virtually every major designer. Go to iTunes to download the full episode!
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Gaultier Haute Couture Spring 2008
item.description: Gaultier is going deep under the sea for his latest Haute Couture collection. Go to iTunes to download the full episode!
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Fashion From the Pits
item.description: A different take on fashion from people who see hundreds of shows a year, the photographers in the pit at the end of the runway.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Paris Hilton
item.description: Paris Hilton greeted hoards of eager fans at the launch of her very own footwear collection, downtown Montreal.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Pussycat Dolls
item.description: The Pussycat Dolls perform and Robin Antin shows off her new lingerie line at L.A. Fashion Week.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Models For Christ
item.description: Models for Christ: a band of industry professionals who call themselves marketplace missionaries, out to clean up the fashion world one prayer at a time.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Stress in Fashion
item.description: It's no secret that the fashion world can be a pretty hectic place! We asked some of the top people in the industry how they deal with all of the stress.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Dior Couture Spring 2008
item.description: John Galliano was channeling the symbolist artists for this collection. With gigantic overblown shapes, eye-popping colours and lamp-shade hats the whole presentation was a sixties trip!
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Lauren Conrad
item.description: Lauren Conrad - star of the hugely popular MTV reality show 'the Hills' - sits down with Jeanne Beker to talk about living in the public eye, her old friend Heidi and what makes this celebrity line stand out from the rest...
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Michael Kors Spring 2008
item.description: Bette Midler checks out the latest colourful designs from Michael Kors.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Pucci Fall 2008
item.description: Matthew Williamson injected a bit of go-go dancer into the Pucci girl's look this season and didn't hesitate to mention why designing for fall in particular is so stressful!
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Rodarte Spring/Fall 2008
item.description: The sisters behind red hot label Rodarte invite us into their L.A. studio to watch their intricate dresses come to life. Coveted by Cate Blanchet, Keira Knightly, Natalie Portman and Kirsten Dunst, it's no wonder they've got the fashion crowd drooling.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Ossie Clark
item.description: Ossie Clark is no longer just for the savvy vintage shopper. More than a decade after Clark's tragic death, the iconic British label has been revived.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Chanel R2W Spring 2008
item.description: We hang out with Courtney Love at the Chanel show and get her take on the collection. Inspired by America, for the first time Lagerfeld sent back three models because they were too thin.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: First Model Out
item.description: A look at the first model out on the runway and how important this position is to determining the modeling stars of the future.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Versace Fall 2008
item.description: We head to Milan to check out Donatella's offerings for Fall and bump into Fergie, Megan Fox and the new face of her men's collection - Patrick Dempsey. At the store launch in New York, Patti LaBelle tells us why she loves the brand.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Fendi Fall 2008
item.description: Fendi's latest is inspired by Northern girls who are 'like strange creatures with wild eyes.' Claudia Schiffer, Sofia Coppola and the Olsen twins attend Fendi's new store opening with a performance by Amy Winehouse.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Marc Jacobs Fall 2008
item.description: Last time Marc Jacobs started over two hours late and this time he started early causing some to miss his show.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Berlin Fashion Week
item.description: Naomi Campbell kicks off the second season of Berlin Fashion Week.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Ungaro Fall 2008
item.description: 23 year old Esteban Cortazar has his dreams come true as the new head designer of the house of Emanuel Ungaro.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Victoria Beckham dVb Denim Line
item.description: Fans line up in Toronto where Jeanne Beker grabs a one-on-one with fashion fan and muse Victoria Beckham. The Spice Girl chats about fame, fashion, family and her obsession with denim.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Sean John Fall 2008
item.description: Sean 'Diddy' Combs comes back to New York Fashion Week to celebrate the tenth anniversary of his Sean John label.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: House of Holland Fall 2008
item.description: Henry Holland and Agyness Deyn-two of London's coolest fashion kids - make House of Holland's second runway show a show to remember.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Agyness Deyn
item.description: British 'it girl' Agyness Deyn has only been modeling for a few seasons now, but she's already been coined as the 'new Kate Moss'.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Fergie for M.A.C.
item.description: Fergie helps raise HIV and AIDS awareness as the newest face of M.A.C. Viva Glam lipstick.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Armani Prive Spring 2008
item.description: Dita Von Teese loves his suits. Ellen Pompeo thinks he's gorgeous. It seems everything about Mr. Giorgio Armani is a crowd-pleaser.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Vivienne Westwood Red Label Fall 2008
item.description: On top of the usual political undertones in her latest collection, this season Vivienne Westwood has taken on a new mission - bringing fashion's finicky eye back to London.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Christian Lacroix Haute Couture Spring 2008
item.description: The eclectic madness of Lacroix, a look at the world's most colourful couture collection.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Sao Paulo Fashion Week Fall 2008
item.description: With 39 shows and a growing international presence, Sao Paulo Fashion Week is the biggest fashion event in Latin America. Vivienne Westwood was there to kick off the event.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Karl Lagerfeld Spring 2008
item.description: Lagerfeld still maintains his classic quality while designing for younger people and staying hip.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: The Misshapes
item.description: Nightlife and style -- How a group of young DJs are influencing fashion and their wild parties.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Halston Revival in New York
item.description: The revival of the Halston label at New York Fashion Week is the most buzzed about show there.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: RM by Roland Mouret Fall 2008
item.description: Known for designing fitted and feminine dresses for A-list celebrities, Mouret showed his ready-to-wear collection during Paris' Haute Couture week. Victoria Beckham and Claudia Schiffer came out to support.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Academy Awards - Costume Design
item.description: At the Academy Awards fashion usually means the beautiful dresses that the movie stars wear on the red carpet. FT takes a look at the other side - the costume designs that the very same stars wear in the movies that made them famous to begin with.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Chick by Nicky Hilton Spring 2008
item.description: Celebrities Jaime Pressly and Bai Ling look on as Nicky Hilton debuts her Chick line in L.A.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Alicia Keys Flare Photo Shoot
item.description: Alicia Keys channels her inner model and works it for the camera at her Flare Magazine cover shoot.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: L.A.M.B. Spring 2008
item.description: Gwen Stefani presents a collection inspired by the ska and mod music she grew up with.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Burberry Spring 2008
item.description: Christopher Bailey presents his idea of the luxury warrior in his Spring collection for Burberry with creamy coffee colours and as always - a beautiful range of bags.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Elle Muliarchyk and Bella Freud
item.description: Elle Muliarchyk takes photos of herself in dangerous locations for her collaboration with British designer Bella Freud.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Iconic America
item.description: Tommy Hilfiger and George Lois collaborate on a book jam packed with the American icons that have inspired them over the years in hopes of helping the world look a little more favourably on their country.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Zac Posen Spring 2008
item.description: Zac Posen impressed his celeb-heavy audience this season with an urban take on Shaker fashion.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: FT News: Lingerie
item.description: New Store from Agent Provocateur, Sizziling Hot La Senza, Triumph Design Contest, and Vitoria's Secret ad with Adriana Lima.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Sao Paulo Fashion Week
item.description: The event that helped launched the careers of top models as Gisele Bundchen and Adrianna Lima has just wrapped up in Brazil and FT was there.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Pucci Spring 2008
item.description: Matthew Williamson shows his collection for Pucci in Milan and then two months later, heads to Miami for the label's 60th anniversary celebration.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Galliano Spring 2008
item.description: With a stadium flanked by carousels and lifeguards and inspirations such as Coney Island, Andy Warhol and Edie Beale, Galliano pulls out all the stops.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Warhol X Levi's X Hirst
item.description: In New York, Levi's for art lovers - Andy Warhol and Damien Hirst jeans at the Gagosian gallery.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Gucci Spring 2008
item.description: In Milan, Frida Giannini's Gucci collection failed to rock despite her rock 'n' roll theme.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Maxim Chio Swimwear Shoot
item.description: On the set with Chio and Maxim magazine as the shoot an editorial for the 'Canadian Hot Girl contest'.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Celebrity Style: Kelly Carlson
item.description: 'Nip and Tuck' starlette Kelly Carlson talks to Glen Baxter about her love a fashion.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: CiRCA Nightclub
item.description: Infamous NY nightlife kingpin Peter Gatien opens his first Toronto night club.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Versace Spring 2008
item.description: Donatella Versace presents a sexy, colourful collection for spring.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Flashback: Benazir Bhutto
item.description: Back in 1996, FT explored the growing fashion trend in Pakistan and spoke with the late prime minister Benazir Bhutto on her views on fashion.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Toronto Fashion Week
item.description: Toronto Fashion Week presents the latest from Canadian designers in a tent in the heart of the city.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Click Chic
item.description: Big buzz surrounded the Click Chic exhibit which featured nearly fifty images by six New York based photographers.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Chanel Iman
item.description: Successful model Chanel Iman gives a teenager's perspective on a career in fashion.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Tahiti's Next Top Model
item.description: In Tahiti, a spectacular contest uncovers the most beautiful model in French Polynesia.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Julien MacDonald Fall 2007
item.description: Julien MacDonald shows another glitzy collection in London and keeps the fashion crowd guessing where he's going to show next.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Chanel Paris-London
item.description: Chanel's first ever runway presentation in London is a tribute to the British men who inspired Coco Chanel. Model Irina Lazareanu and Sean Lennon provided the soundtrack.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Celebrity Style: Vanessa Carlton
item.description: Glen Baxter sits with Vanessa Carlton to talk about her style and new album.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Kenneth Cole
item.description: Kenneth Cole talks about his amazing career and his newest campaign working with Bon Jovi.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com

item.title: Garrett Neff
item.description: Mary Kitchen spends the day with new Calvin Klein poster boy Garret Neff. The hot Canadian boy shows us his charm.
item.author: FashionTelevision.com
